name: Magisc Pong!
description:
Magisc! Pong is my entry into the 2018 Femicom Game Jam! The challenge was "make cute PONG".

The game is a single-player game starring Jane Harmony, magic-less daughter of the famous magical girl (haven't you heard of her?) Hyssop Harmony. Help her navigate three levels as she learns to play pong and impress her crush!

Controls with the keyboard.
